root.name: Owlboy
root.description: OverviewOwlboy is an action adventure platformer that follows Otus, a hybrid between a boy and an owl, on his quest to protect his village from sky pirates. The game is being created by the Norwegian developer D-pad Studio and is famous for its highly detailed pixel artwork. A demo for Owlboy was released in 2011 with plans for the game to be released during the same year. However Owlboy was delayed and D-pad Studios has stated that the 2011 demo no longer reflects what the final game will be like. No official launch date has been set for Owlboy but the the developer has said that it hopes to release the game in Spring of 2013.LinksDeveloper's WebsiteOfficial Owlboy website
